featured.text: taking time to understand and respect each other, we become demanding, resentful, judgmental, and intolerant. __(36)__, our relationships are filled with unnecessary disagreements and conflicts.
It can be used to show, for example, disagreement or lack of interest.

definition.en_def: A situation in which two or more parties have differing opinions or views.
definition.example: There was a disagreement between the team members about the best approach to the project.
